body: No doubt about it. Lolis getting kidnapped, becoming a slave and then raping them is definitely the best thing in this world. Also, there are only flat/small chested here and none of those filthy big breasted characters. This is, without a doubt, one of the best doujins I've ever discovered.
What is it with those QR codes at the end? My scanner says they are invalid?
still can't believe how many games they made of this so far and how i had to buy them all
they tracking you m8. better run, the FBI is near
